id.comment: Variable in RHS of assignments that are in if loops

query.querystr: variable v; if i; assign a; Select v such that Uses(a, v) such that Parent(i, a)

id.comment: variables in LHS of assignments that are in while loops

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select v such that Modifies(a, v) such that Parent*(w, a)

id.comment: assignments that are in if loops and are directly in a if loop with z in RHS

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select a such that Modifies(a, v) such that Parent*(w, a) pattern a(_, _"z"_)

id.comment: ifs that are in while loops, which has an assignment value with expression D+E

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; while w; Select w such that Parent*(w, a) such that Modifies (w,v) pattern a (_,_"B%20"_)

id.comment: procedures that have an assignment in a while loop that has x in LHS

query.querystr: procedure p; assign a; Select p such that Calls(p,"main2") such that Modifies(p,"x")
while w; assign a; Select <w,a> such that Parent*(w, a) pattern a ("z","z-20")

id.comment: return procedures that calls main2 and has abc in LHS of assignments

query.querystr: procedure p; assign a; Select p such that Calls*(p, "main2") such that Uses(p,"xyz") pattern a ("abc",_)

id.comment: returns an assignment in a procedure that calls main2 and uses variabble x that are in if loops

query.querystr: procedure p; if i; assign a; Select a such that Parent(i,a) such that Uses(i,"z")

id.comment: returns while and assignments that are in while loops, which modifies a variable with pattern xyz + 123 in RHS

query.querystr: while w; assign a; variable v; Select <w,a> such that Parent*(w,a) such that Modifies(a,v) pattern a (_, _"xyz + 123"_)

id.comment: returns variable that is modified in a while loop with RHS pattern _x+1_

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; while w; Select v such that Modifies(a,v) such that Parent(w,a) pattern a (_, _"x+1"_)

id.comment: return ifs that have an assignment value in a while loop with z-20 in RHS

query.querystr: assign a; if i; while w; variable v; Select i such that Uses(i,"x") such that Modifies(i,"y") pattern a (_,_"x"_)

id.comment: return assignments and values that are in while loops with E in LHS

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; while w; Select <a,v> such that Modifies(a, v) such that Parent*(w, a) pattern a ("E",_)

id.comment: returns while loops with an assignment with 1 in RHS that is in a while loop

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select w pattern a (_,_"1"_) such that Uses(w, v) such that Parent* (w, a)
